titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals to designate income tax overpayments to support relief efforts in response to Hurricane Katrina.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) establish in the Treasury the Hurricane Katrina Relief Fund; and (2) allow individual taxpayers to designate any amount of an income tax overpayment to be paid over to such Fund.
